text:
Employment

A new departure in co-operative between workingmen and employers is the National Employment Exchange, just opened in N.Y.C. Its aim is the providing of a place where skilled workmen of all kinds can congregate mornings for the purpose of being interviewed by prospective employers.

From Photo-News Dept.
American Press Assoc.
225 W. 39th St., N.Y.

c. 1917
title: Manhattan: Cooper Square - [Employment.]
